overview: Once upon a time in the Faroe Islands, there lived three brothers. After the death of one brother, the  other two struggle with their different ways of grieving, and generally just get on each other's nerves.  Beautiful rugged scenery of the remote Faroe Islands act as a backdrop to a timeless story of brothers  with diametrically opposite relationships to religion, duty and family
tagline: Let the dead bury the dead
title: Brother Troll
